about_the_game:
A space-opera fantasy strategy game that provides intense, fast-paced real time strategy battles. Rogue Nova brings a cast of colourful characters through a planet hopping adventure where you must protect Princess Valeria from the mysterious and relentless Baron as he hunts you across the galaxy.
With control and customisation over your fleet, you have full control and to lead your way against the challenges of the galaxy; from the Baron and his ruthless armada, to treacherous Pirates and Bounty Hunters and conspiring space-Wizards as you search for safe refuge amongst the stars.

content_descriptors.notes: Rogue Novas contains fantasy violence, and some drinking and smoking material.

short_description: An intense, fast-paced real time strategy space opera, with a cast of colourful characters through a planet hopping adventure. Do you have what it takes to escape the relentless Baron protect of Princess Valeria?
